mapper.select: select b.member_id as member_id, b.items_id as items_id, b.amount as amount, i.img as img, i.name as name, i.price as price, i.delivery as delivery from basket b join items i on i.items_id=b.items_id where member_id = #{param1};
mapper.delete: delete from basket where member_id=#{param1} and items_id=#{param2};
